source.936b6d86:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fig, axs = plt.subplots(2)
fig.suptitle('Monthly Distrubition')

axs[0].plot(month_df[' GTOPLAM'])
axs[0].set_xlabel('Month')
axs[0].set_ylabel('Tourist Number')
axs[0].set_title('Total Tourist Number By Month')

axs[1].plot(month_df.drop(' GTOPLAM',axis=1).mean(axis=1))
axs[1].set_xlabel('Month')
axs[1].set_ylabel('Tourist Number')
axs[1].set_title('Mean Tourist Number By Month')
